snippet.title: Off The Grid Cinema - VINCENT
snippet.description:
In this episode, meet Vincent Roberts, who will go to any lengths to keep Cascadia’s brand image clean. Even if that means hiring a Zero.  

Still, the decision to trust a loose cannon like Kevin Chandler with Cascadia’s reputation at stake troubles him. And why does his boss, Cascadia’s cyber-CEO, VOYANCE, seem so unconcerned with it all?  

----- 

🤯 Enjoyed our first full-length episode of OTG Cinema? 

Then make sure to check out the series teaser, SWITCHER, for a taste of what’s to come: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ufgDqcH7aQ  

----- 

Remember to subscribe to our channel to keep up with everything #OTG!  

Still want more? Stay up to date with #OTG through our social media channels:
